actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 8 of the U.S. Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of requiring the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development and public housing agencies to notify certain Members of Congress before entering into annual contributions contracts under such section.

summary.text: Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development or public housing agencies with which the Secretary is dealing to notify Members of Congress before entering into annual contributions contracts to assist housing projects in such Member's congressional district or State.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8 of the U.S. Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of requiring the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development and public housing agencies to notify certain Members of Congress before entering into annual contributions contracts under such section.
